channel.title: Qt on Dan Aukes
channel.description: Recent content in Qt on Dan Aukes

item.title: Decapitalizer
item.description: A nice little program that can change capitalization. Includes installer.

item.title: Empty QT5 GUI
item.description: A nice little empty python package for developing qt5 guis, with installer setup file. It builds right now, using the anaconda distribution and cx_freeze
